channel.title: Research on Joshua Dunlap
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Joshua Dunlap

item.title: The Arkansas Arsenal
item.description: A comprehensive investigation into Arkansas defense manufacturing, the political architecture sustaining it, and the documented end-use of Arkansas-made weapons in attacks on civilian populations.

item.title: The Pension Pipeline
item.description: A forensic investigation documenting how the Arkansas Teacher Retirement System Board breached its fiduciary duty through a politically-driven $50 million Israel Bond investment and the strategic hiring of an ideological proxy advisor.
